Articles.Content:
Does anyone know if there is a way to detect mods that are not being used?

Alternatively, is there a way to detect which mods are being used in a particular save file?

Also of use would be a tool to enable/disable mods in-game, if such a thing exists...

Thanks,

Crash

1 hour ago, CrashTestDanny said:

Does anyone know if there is a way to detect mods that are not being used?

Alternatively, is there a way to detect which mods are being used in a particular save file?

Also of use would be a tool to enable/disable mods in-game, if such a thing exists...

Thanks,

Crash

I don't believe so, but I would recommend using CKAN so that you don't accidentally uninstall mods that you need.
